BuildMonument_Basic.questDescriptionRule.li:
commonEnding->The monument is [monumentSize] in size and will require these resources (total value [monumentRequiredResourcesMarketValue_money]):

[monumentRequiredResources]

Construction must be completed within [constructionTimeoutTicks_duration] of accepting the task. You'll receive the rewards when you finish construction.[dontDestroyMonument]
dontDestroyMonument->\n\n기념비가 건설된 후 [keepMonumentTicks_duration] 내로 파괴된다면, [asker_factionName](와)과 관계도가 [goodwillChangeIfMonumentDestroyed]만큼 떨어집니다.
